title: Mutual recursion with methods f and g

content.description: Assume that methods f and g are defined as follows.
content.question: public int f(int x) { if (x <= 0) { return 0; } else { return g(x - 1); } } public int g(int x) { if (x <= 0) { return 0; } else { return (f(x - 1) + x); } } What value is returned as a result of the call f(6)?

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
